dt: {bc}not given proper or necessary attention or {d_link|care|care:1} {bc}not cared for {bc}{sx|neglected||}

dt.t: He had just the same {wi}uncared-for{/wi}, ragged appearance that the house had.
… some broken men … utterly forgotten and {wi}uncared for{/wi} …

shortdef: not given proper or necessary attention or care : not cared for : neglected
